name: Despina (extronaut)
description:
You play as a traveler called Para who just entered the city, Despina. You are exhausted from your travels, but you have a new goal now: Earn your chance to live in the best hotel in Despina: Paradies! Explore and communicate with citizens to get your ticket to Paradies! Good luck!

Game Design Documentation:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NZpPOfJ9YmzBU0aiClDohqihWkmK9DtAUeoiM2lw5hw/...
